title: Shark Tank's Daymond John Backs Gamestar+
itunes:title: Shark Tank's Daymond John Backs Gamestar+
description:
FUBU CEO Daymond John, star of ABC’s Shark Tank, discusses investing in a streaming board game platform called Gamestar+.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
